mean_cn: adj.景色优美的；舞台背景的，舞台的；  n.风景名胜
mean_en: having, providing, or relating to a pleasing or beautiful view of natural scenery (such as mountains, hills, valleys, etc.)
sentence: These scenic islands are the perfect place to go traveling.
sentence_trans: 这些景色优美的岛屿是旅行的绝佳地点。
word_etyma: scen=scene情景 + ic形容词，...的 → 自然景色的
